languages.text: "Ты играешь словами и ускользаешь от ответа!" {n}В голосе Ирлиэт начинают звенеть нотки отчаяния — и гнева.{/n} "Лилэтан грозит наш извечный враг — и все же ты больше заботишься присутствием элантах, чем текущей по жилам этого мира скверной! Неужели ты не предполагал, что своей войной ты лишь ускоряешь торжество Сай'лантреш? Быть может, слуги правительницы, стремясь защитить ее, пускают в ход все больше инструментов скверны..."

traits.locale_text: "Ты играешь словами и ускользаешь от ответа!" {n}В голосе Ирлиэт начинают звенеть нотки отчаяния — и гнева.{/n} "Лилэтан грозит наш извечный враг — и все же ты больше заботишься присутствием эл'антар, чем текущей по жилам этого мира скверной! Неужели ты не предполагал, что своей войной ты лишь ускоряешь торжество Сай'лантреш? Быть может, слуги правительницы, стремясь защитить ее, пускают в ход все больше инструментов скверны..."

languages.text: "You are playing with words and avoiding the question!" {n}Notes of desperation — and rage — are creeping into Yrliet's voice now.{/n} "The Lilaethan is under threat from our eternal foe — and yet you're more concerned about the presence of the elantach than the corruption that is flowing through the veins of this world! Did you never consider that your war might simply be hastening Sai'lanthresh's triumph? Perhaps the ruler's servants, in their efforts to protect her, will resort to more and more instruments of corruption..."
languages.original_text: "Ты играешь словами и ускользаешь от ответа!" {n}В голосе Ирлиэт начинают звенеть нотки отчаяния — и гнева.{/n} "Лилэтан грозит наш извечный враг — и все же ты больше заботишься присутствием элантах, чем текущей по жилам этого мира скверной! Неужели ты не предполагал, что своей войной ты лишь ускоряешь торжество Сай'лантреш? Быть может, слуги правительницы, стремясь защитить ее, пускают в ход все больше инструментов скверны..."

Did you never consider that your war might simply be hastening Sai'lanthresh's triumph? Perhaps the ruler's servants, in their efforts to protect her, will resort to more and more instruments of corruption..."

Did you never consider that your war might simply be hastening Sai'lanthresh's triumph? Perhaps the ruler's servants, in their efforts to protect her, will resort to more and more instruments of corruption..."

languages.text: “你这是在巧言令色，回避问题！”{n}不知何时，伊莉耶特的声音中已经带上了绝望与愤怒的意味。{/n}“莉莱赞正在遭受我们永恒宿敌的威胁，可你眼中只有这位外界人，根本不在乎流淌在这个世界血脉中的腐化！难道你从来都没有考虑过，你的战争可能只会让赛·兰斯雷什更快地获得胜利吗？或许这颗行星统治者的仆人们为了保护她，会越来越多地诉诸于腐化的造物……”
languages.original_text: "You are playing with words and avoiding the question!" {n}Notes of desperation — and rage — are creeping into Yrliet's voice now.{/n} "The Lilaethan is under threat from our eternal foe — and yet you're more concerned about the presence of the elantach than the corruption that is flowing through the veins of this world! Did you never consider that your war might simply be hastening Sai'lanthresh's triumph? Perhaps the ruler's servants, in their efforts to protect her, will resort to more and more instruments of corruption..."

traits.locale_text: “你这是在巧言令色，回避问题！”{n}不知何时，伊莉耶特的声音中已经带上了绝望与愤怒的意味。{/n}“莉莱赞正在遭受我们永恒宿敌的威胁，可你眼中只有这位外界人，根本不在乎流淌在这个世界血脉中的腐化！难道你从来都没有考虑过，你的战争可能只会让赛·兰斯雷什更快地获得胜利吗？或许这颗行星统治者的仆人们为了保护她，会越来越多地诉诸于腐化的造物……”

languages.text: 「言葉遊びではぐらかすな！」{n}絶望の、そして憤怒の響きがユリエットの声に混じる。{/n}「リラエタンは、我々の宿敵に脅かされている。それなのにお前は、星の地脈を流れる腐朽の力よりもエランタの存在ばかりを不安視している！この戦争でセランスレッシュの勝利が早まるだけとは思わなかったのか？おそらく、支配者の従者は彼女を守るために、ますます腐朽の力に手を染めていくだろう…」
languages.original_text: "You are playing with words and avoiding the question!" {n}Notes of desperation — and rage — are creeping into Yrliet's voice now.{/n} "The Lilaethan is under threat from our eternal foe — and yet you're more concerned about the presence of the elantach than the corruption that is flowing through the veins of this world! Did you never consider that your war might simply be hastening Sai'lanthresh's triumph? Perhaps the ruler's servants, in their efforts to protect her, will resort to more and more instruments of corruption..."

traits.locale_text: 「言葉遊びではぐらかすな！」{n}絶望の、そして憤怒の響きがユリエットの声に混じる。{/n}「リラエタンは、我々の宿敵に脅かされている。それなのにお前は、星の地脈を流れる腐朽の力よりもエランタの存在ばかりを不安視している！この戦争でセランスレッシュの勝利が早まるだけとは思わなかったのか？おそらく、支配者の従者は彼女を守るために、ますます腐朽の力に手を染めていくだろう…」

languages.text: "Ihr spielt mit Worten und geht der Frage aus dem Weg!" {n}Ein Hauch von Verzweiflung – und Wut – mischt sich nun in Yrliets Stimme.{/n} "Lileath wird von unserer ewigen Feindin bedroht – und dennoch beunruhigt Euch die Anwesenheit des Elantach mehr als die Verderbtheit, die durch die Adern dieser Welt fließt! Habt Ihr nie erwogen, dass Euer Krieg Sai'lanthreshs Triumph schlichtweg nur beschleunigt? Vielleicht werden die Diener der Herrscherin in ihren Bemühungen, sie zu schützen, mehr und mehr zu verderbten Methoden greifen ..."
languages.original_text: "You are playing with words and avoiding the question!" {n}Notes of desperation — and rage — are creeping into Yrliet's voice now.{/n} "The Lilaethan is under threat from our eternal foe — and yet you're more concerned about the presence of the elantach than the corruption that is flowing through the veins of this world! Did you never consider that your war might simply be hastening Sai'lanthresh's triumph? Perhaps the ruler's servants, in their efforts to protect her, will resort to more and more instruments of corruption..."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr spielt mit Worten und geht der Frage aus dem Weg!" {n}Ein Hauch von Verzweiflung – und Wut – mischt sich nun in Yrliets Stimme.{/n} "Lileath wird von unserer ewigen Feindin bedroht – und dennoch beunruhigt Euch die Anwesenheit des Elantach mehr als die Verderbtheit, die durch die Adern dieser Welt fließt! Habt Ihr nie erwogen, dass Euer Krieg Sai'lanthreshs Triumph schlichtweg nur beschleunigt? Vielleicht werden die Diener der Herrscherin in ihren Bemühungen, sie zu schützen, mehr und mehr zu verderbten Methoden greifen ..."

languages.text: {n}Lorsqu'Yrliet reprend la parole, vous décelez une pointe de désespoir et de colère dans sa voix.{/n} « Cessez de jouer avec les mots et d'éluder la question ! Alors que la lilaethan est menacée par notre ennemie éternelle, vous vous préoccupez davantage de la présence des elantach que de la corruption qui coule dans les veines de ce monde ! Ne vous est-il jamais venu à l'idée que votre guerre ne fait qu'accélérer le triomphe de Sai'lanthresh ? En s'efforçant de protéger la dirigeante, ses serviteurs ne risquent-ils pas de recourir à toujours plus d'instruments de corruption ? »
languages.original_text: "You are playing with words and avoiding the question!" {n}Notes of desperation — and rage — are creeping into Yrliet's voice now.{/n} "The Lilaethan is under threat from our eternal foe — and yet you're more concerned about the presence of the elantach than the corruption that is flowing through the veins of this world! Did you never consider that your war might simply be hastening Sai'lanthresh's triumph? Perhaps the ruler's servants, in their efforts to protect her, will resort to more and more instruments of corruption..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Lorsqu'Yrliet reprend la parole, vous décelez une pointe de désespoir et de colère dans sa voix.{/n} « Cessez de jouer avec les mots et d'éluder la question ! Alors que la lilaethan est menacée par notre ennemie éternelle, vous vous préoccupez davantage de la présence des elantach que de la corruption qui coule dans les veines de ce monde ! Ne vous est-il jamais venu à l'idée que votre guerre ne fait qu'accélérer le triomphe de Sai'lanthresh ? En s'efforçant de protéger la dirigeante, ses serviteurs ne risquent-ils pas de recourir à toujours plus d'instruments de corruption ? »

languages.text: «¡No haces más que jugar con las palabras y evitar las preguntas!». {n}Ahora puedes identificar retazos de desesperación (y rabia) en la voz de Yrliet.{/n} «El Lilaethan se ve amenazado por nuestro enemigo eterno, ¡y a ti te inquieta más la presencia de los elantach que la corrupción que fluye por las venas del mundo! ¿Es que nunca has considerado la posibilidad de que tu guerra esté acelerando el triunfo de Sai'lanthresh? Es probable que los siervos de la gobernante, en su afán por protegerla, recurran a instrumentos de corrupción cada vez más poderosos...».
languages.original_text: "You are playing with words and avoiding the question!" {n}Notes of desperation — and rage — are creeping into Yrliet's voice now.{/n} "The Lilaethan is under threat from our eternal foe — and yet you're more concerned about the presence of the elantach than the corruption that is flowing through the veins of this world! Did you never consider that your war might simply be hastening Sai'lanthresh's triumph? Perhaps the ruler's servants, in their efforts to protect her, will resort to more and more instruments of corruption..."

traits.locale_text: «¡No haces más que jugar con las palabras y evitar las preguntas!». {n}Ahora puedes identificar retazos de desesperación (y rabia) en la voz de Yrliet.{/n} «El Lilaethan se ve amenazado por nuestro enemigo eterno, ¡y a ti te inquieta más la presencia de los elantach que la corrupción que fluye por las venas del mundo! ¿Es que nunca has considerado la posibilidad de que tu guerra esté acelerando el triunfo de Sai'lanthresh? Es probable que los siervos de la gobernante, en su afán por protegerla, recurran a instrumentos de corrupción cada vez más poderosos...».

languages.text: "Laf cambazlığı yapıp soruyu savuşturuyorsun!" {n}Yrliet'in sesinde çaresizlik ve hiddet notaları hissedilmeye başlıyor.{/n} "Lilaethan, ebedî düşmanımızın tehdidi altında. Senin derdinse bu dünyanın damarlarından akan yozlaşma değil, elantach'ın varlığı! Acaba savaşınla Sai'lanthresh'in zaferine hız kazandırdığın hiç aklına geldi mi? Belki de hükümdarın hizmetkârları, onu korumak amacıyla yozlaşma araçlarına daha çok başvuracak..."
languages.original_text: "You are playing with words and avoiding the question!" {n}Notes of desperation — and rage — are creeping into Yrliet's voice now.{/n} "The Lilaethan is under threat from our eternal foe — and yet you're more concerned about the presence of the elantach than the corruption that is flowing through the veins of this world! Did you never consider that your war might simply be hastening Sai'lanthresh's triumph? Perhaps the ruler's servants, in their efforts to protect her, will resort to more and more instruments of corruption..."

traits.locale_text: "Laf cambazlığı yapıp soruyu savuşturuyorsun!" {n}Yrliet'in sesinde çaresizlik ve hiddet notaları hissedilmeye başlıyor.{/n} "Lilaethan, ebedî düşmanımızın tehdidi altında. Senin derdinse bu dünyanın damarlarından akan yozlaşma değil, elantach'ın varlığı! Acaba savaşınla Sai'lanthresh'in zaferine hız kazandırdığın hiç aklına geldi mi? Belki de hükümdarın hizmetkârları, onu korumak amacıyla yozlaşma araçlarına daha çok başvuracak..."
